knimeNode.name: Variable Timed Loop End
knimeNode.shortDescription: Variable Loop End node for timed loops, exposing unprocessed rows in the final port

intro.p: Variable Loop end node to partner with 'Run-to-time' and 'Run-for-time' loop start nodes. Variable values for each iteration are collected as a table at the first output port, and rows which were not processed before the loop execution finished as a result of the time setting of the loop start node are made available at the last output port. Flow variables with the last iteration counter and end time are exposed. The node must end a loop starting with a 'Run-to-time' or 'Run-for-time' node.
NB A loop starting with a Table Row to Variable timed loop start node containing a missing value in the first row will fail loop execution
